source.querystring: select  'New Zealand' as COUNTRY, (a.GIVEN_NAME + a.SURNAME) as FULLNAME, a.ADDR1, a.ADDR2, a.ADDR3, a.EMAIL, a.HPHONE, IIF(TRIM(a.MOBILE) == '','','+64'+ a.MOBILE) as MOBILE, a.POSTCODE, a.STATE, a.TITLE, a.OCCUPT, a.SURNAME, a.GIVEN_NAME, a.POSTADDR1, a.POSTADDR2, a.POSTADDR3, a.POSTSTATE, a.POSTPCODE, a.SEX, a.KNOWNAS, a.WPHONE, a.PHONE3, a.POSTNAME, a.BIRTHDAY, a.FIRSTVISIT, a.LASTRCLET, a.LASTRECALL, a.LASTVISIT, a.NEXTRCLET, a.NEXTRECALL, a.RECALL, a.RECALLSENT, a.FPOSTADDR, a.RCPERIOD, a.REFNUM, b.BOOKDATE, b.STARTTIME, b.STATUS, c.PAMOUNT from VPATIENT a left join (select k.BOOKDATE, k.STARTTIME, k.REFNUM, k.STATUS from (select max(BOOKDATE) as BOOKDATE, REFNUM from VAPPOINT group by REFNUM) h inner join VAPPOINT k on h.BOOKDATE = k.BOOKDATE and h.REFNUM = k.REFNUM) b on a.REFNUM = b.REFNUM left join (SELECT n.REFNUM, SUM(n.PAMOUNT) as PAMOUNT FROM (SELECT MAX(ACCDATE) as ACCDATE,REFNUM from VACCOUNT GROUP BY REFNUM) m inner join VACCOUNT n on m.ACCDATE = n.ACCDATE and m.REFNUM = n.REFNUM GROUP BY n.REFNUM) c on a.REFNUM = c.REFNUM where (!EMPTY(TRIM(a.SURNAME)) OR !EMPTY(TRIM(a.GIVEN_NAME))) order by a.REFNUM

SELECT j.refnum, IIF(j.nextrecall<DATE() AND !ISNULL(k.senddate), k.senddate, IIF(!ISNULL(k.senddate), IIF(j.nextrecall<k.senddate, j.nextrecall, k.senddate), j.nextrecall)) as senddate, IIF(j.nextrecall<DATE() AND !ISNULL(k.senddate), k.letter, IIF(!ISNULL(k.senddate), IIF(j.nextrecall<k.senddate, j.nextrclet, k.letter), j.nextrclet)) as letter from vpatient j left join (SELECT distinct a.senddate, a.refnum, b.letter FROM (SELECT MIN(senddate) as senddate, refnum FROM vprecall WHERE senddate>DATE()-1 GROUP BY refnum) a inner join vprecall b on a.refnum = b.refnum and a.senddate = b.senddate AND TRIM(b.letter) <> ' ' ORDER BY a.refnum) k ON j.refnum = k.refnum
